doc.previous: The practical assumptions for the application of simple Kriging are  Simple kriging is mathematically the simplest but the least general It assumes the expectation of the random field to be known and relies on a covariance function However in most applications neither the expectation nor the covariance are known beforehand
doc.after: The Kriging weights of simple Kriging have no unbiasedness condition and are given by the simple Kriging equation system
